a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Deaths from volcanic eruptions, World, 1570 to 2023
Includes direct deaths, in addition to secondary impacts such as a tsunami or earthquake triggered by an
eruption. Due to data availability, recent data will be more complete than older historical estimates.
Data source: National Geophysical Data Center / World Data Service (2024)
